data.text: @BernieSpofforth I just got sick I think it was covid again.  Must be a new variant.
@BernieSpofforth Unclear how this graph of cases over the last two years is supposed to relate to your remark about attitude change over the last two weeks.
@BernieSpofforth @EdwardoYazzie Isn't there some 'crisis' in Hong Kong?

@Shahilacom @BernieSpofforth There’s a war in Europe dominating the news cycle. This isn’t an existential question like trees falling in the wood - stuff still happens even when the media does report it.
@BernieSpofforth No one is lying to you, the media has moved on to Ukraine
@BernieSpofforth There's a war on in Europe
@BernieSpofforth I think that people are,mostly,more aware of how data is presented now and less likely to take it at face value.
